title: Haryana sets up Covid-19 control room to ensure steady supply of oxygen
description: Amid a rapid rise in Covid-19 cases and while realising the need to meet the current surge in demand for medical oxygen across the state, the Haryana government has set up the control room at the Civil Secretariat in Chandigarh

title: In COVID Times, Haryana is Making Direct Cash Transfer to Farmers. State Agriculture Minister Explains How
description: This Rabi season, Haryana could register an all-time record in wheat procurement from farmers.

title: Coronavirus: Haryana, Ladakh announce free vaccination for all above 18 years
description: Haryana Health Minister Anil Vij said that his government has placed an order for 40 lakh Covishield vaccine shots and 26 lakh Covaxin doses.

title: Haryana Cong MLA Kiran Choudhry’s parents die of Covid-19
description: While Father Brig Atma Singh (retd) died in morning, mother Sarlat Devi succumbed to virus in evening Congress MLA from Tosham, Kiran Choudhry on Monday lost her parents to Covid-19.

title: Haryana’s largest health institute runs out of gas, can’t admit more Covid patients | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Rohtak: Haryana’s largest health institute, Rohtak-based PGIMS, shut the door on Covid patients on Sunday night due to lack of oxygen.

title: Thief steals COVID-19 vaccines in India, returns shots with 'sorry' note
description: KOLKATA, India — Amid reports of daily COVID-19 cases crossing 300,000 and vaccines going out of supply in India, hundreds of vaccines were stolen from a hospital in the northern Indian state of Haryana on April 22. But the thief — who stole 1,710 COVID-19 vaccinations from the P. P. Center General Hospital in Jind, Haryana — later had a change of heart.

title: Five COVID-19 patients die at Haryana private hospital, kin allege oxygen shortage as cause
description: Chief Minister Manohar Lal Khattar said a magisterial probe has been ordered into the incidents, responding to questions from reporters in Panipat.

title: Vaccine shortage hits drive in Haryana’s Panchkula district
description: As per the immunisation officer, the district is left with 2,000 doses of Covishield, and 11,000 doses of Covaxin; doses being administered daily reduced to a third

title: Haryana govt. takes overinstitute to set up a hospital
description: Doctors will be deputed from the Indian Army, says CM

title: Amid rising COVID-19 cases, Haryana chief secy directs DCs to identify 2-3 banquets in their districts
description: Chandigarh, Apr 26 (PTI) Amid a surge in coronavirus cases in Haryana, Chief Secretary Vijai Vardhan on Monday directed all deputy commissioners to identify two to three banquets or wedding halls in their respective districts so that they can be used in case of emergency.

title: Haryana registers 11,504 new COVID19 cases, 75 fatalities in the last 24 hours
description: Guragon: Haryana registers 11,504 new COVID19 cases, 6,211 recoveries and 75 fatalities in the last 24 hours; case tally at 4,35,823.

title: Haryana govt demands 20,000 Remdesivir injections from Centre
description: Chandigarh (Haryana) [India], April 26 (ANI): In view of a surge in COVID-19 cases across Haryana, the state government on Monday demanded 20,000 Remdesivir injections from the Central government and 40 metric tonnes (MT) of oxygen per day from the Jamshedpur plant in Jharkhand.

title: COVID-19: Haryana govt seeks cylinders from factory owners to supply oxygen
description: Chandigarh [India], April 26 (ANI): Haryana Health Minister Anil Vij on Monday informed that the state government has directed all factory owners in the state to deposit cylinders in their possession to the government in view of a shortage of oxygen cylinders in hospitals amid the COVID-19.

title: Covid-19: Haryana registers 11,504 fresh cases, 75 deaths - United News of India
description: Covid-19: Haryana registers 11,504 fresh cases, 75 deaths

title: Haryana govt placed orders for COVID-19 vaccines, says Anil Vij
description: Chandigarh [India], April 26 (ANI): Haryana Health Minister Anil Vij on Monday said that the state government has placed an order for a total of 66 lakhs of COVID-19 vaccines.

title: On the front lines of India’s second wave of COVID-19
description: India’s healthcare system has been overwhelmed by a devastating second wave of COVID-19.

title: Haryana Police to set up Covid-19 care centres for its personnel
description: These centres would be established either at welfare camps or at the newly built quarters in police lines

title: Haryana Board Class 10 students to be promoted based on internal assessment
description: The Haryana board class 10 exam was scheduled from April 22, but it was cancelled due to worsening Covid-19 situatuions in the state. The class 12 exam scheduled from April 20 has been postponed

title: All Covid beds occupied in Haryana’s Panchkula district
description: Around 50 beds are being added at the community health centre in Raipur Rani, while arrangements are being made for 15 beds at a private facility in Kalka and 25 in Panchkula

title: Haryana’s Covid recovery rate dips to 81.61%
description: Sixty-four patients across 15 districts in Haryana succumbed to Covid-19 on Sunday

title: Over 3K people await Covid report in Haryana’s Jind
description: More than 3,000 people in Jind district are waiting to get their Covid test results since April 18

title: Covid restrictions hamper wedding plans in Haryana, people shifting venue to villages
description: Only a week before the wedding of his daughter, Naresh Kumar, of Ladwa in Kurukshetra, had to shift the venue from a marriage palace to his native village after the government imposed restrictions on gatherings following rise in Covid-19 cases in state

title: Haryana imposes COVID curbs in 6 worst-affected districts. Details here
description: CM ruled out the possibility of imposing a lockdown in the state but said there will be lockdown-like conditions in six worst-affected districts.Deputy commissioners of Gurgaon , Faridabad, Hisar, Karnal, Sonipat and Rohtak have been asked to impose Section 144 of the CrPZC to control the COVID surge

title: Haryana is prepared for Covid surge with vaccines & beds, no need for lockdown: Minister Vij
description: Haryana Home and Health Minister Anil Vij says state is prepared to combat increase in infections, will set rules and get people to follow them strictly.

title: COVID patients from Delhi flock to hospitals in Punjab, Haryana
description: The patients have given the addresses of their relatives or friends living in the city in order to show that they are locals and not from outside.

title: Doctor abused after Covid-19 patient’s death in Haryana, 2 booked | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Police registered a case against two unknown persons who allegedly abused a doctor after the death of an 85-year-old Covid-19 patient in Hisar. Invest

title: Key farm leader says there’s no Covid-19 pandemic, refuses to call off stir
description: Public-health experts have partly blamed large political rallies following state elections and religious gatherings for surging Covid-19 numbers. If coronavirus infections break out at the farmers’ protests since last November, it could risk hundreds of lives, they said.

title: JJP shuts party office in Chandigarh for 2 weeks over Covid-19 situation
description: JJP's Haryana unit chief Nishan Singh said some staff of the deputy CM and employees at the JJP office had contracted the disease.

title: COVID-19 2nd Wave | Remdesivir Available In Haryana Black Market, Costs 10 Times More
description: The authorities are taking necessary measures to ensure that the medication is provided to COVID-19 patients at the price fixed by the government

title: Highlights: Haryana reports 11,854 new Covid-19 cases in last 24 hours
description: India's Covid-19 situation remains grim as hospitals struggle to treat the infected due to lack of medical oxygen, ICU beds.

title: Covid situation worsens in Haryana: 5 districts in critical category, 2 more closing in
description: Haryana on Thursday reported 9,742 fresh Covid-19 cases and 55 deaths

title: Coronavirus | Haryana to discontinue COVID-19 cess on liquor
description: The Haryana Cabinet on Thursday approved the State’s excise policy for the year 2021-22 and decided to discontinue the ‘Covid cess’ on sale of liquor, which was imposed in 2020-21 for generating addit

title: Haryana issues COVID-19 guidelines: Shops to remain shut from 6 pm tomorrow
description: All non essential gatherings have been banned and for holding any functions, permissions have to be taken from the concerned SDM.Haryana on Wednesday recorded the biggest daily jump of 9,623 coronavirus cases and 45 fatalities

title: Covid-19 in Haryana: Shops to close at 6 pm from Friday, ban on non-essential gatherings
description: "All shops will remain closed from 6 pm onward in Haryana from tomorrow (Friday), all non-essential gatherings are banned, anybody holding any function within the prescribed limit will have to seek permission from concerned Sub Divisional Magistrate (SDM)," health minister Anil Vij tweeted.

title: 1,710 doses of Covid-19 vaccine stolen from civil hospital in Haryana
description: 1270 of Covishield and 440 of Covaxin have been stolen from PPC centre

title: Alarming situation: Haryana records 9,623 fresh Covid cases, highest single-day spike
description: Haryana on Wednesday witnessed the most alarming outbreak of Covid-19 infection with 9,623 new cases, in what was by far the biggest single-day surge along with 45 fatalities

title: COVID-19 | Haryana government declares summer vacation in schools till May 31
description: On April 20, the State had recorded 7,811 new cases in its biggest single-day spike so far, while 35 people had succumbed to the disease.

title: Haryana reported more than 73,000 COVID-19 cases in three weeks; Gurgaon alone contributed over 20,000
description: According to data issued by the state's health department, the infection tally in the state rose from 2,90,800 on March 31 to 3,63,813 on April 19.

title: Covid-19 in Haryana: Congress hits out at BJP over pandemic situation
description: State Congress president Kumari Selja and state party in-charge Vinay Bansal, who were in the city, alleged that the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) gave a higher preference to fighting elections rather than working on upgrading healthcare and saving lives.

title: 83 more die in Punjab, 33 in Haryana as India witnesses 2.59 lakh more Covid cases
description: 1,761 more deaths reported India's total tally of Covid cases climbed to 1,53,21,089 with 2,59,170 new coronavirus infections being reported in a day, while active cases surpassed the 20-lakh mark, according to the Union Health Ministry data updated on Tuesday.

title: Haryana adds 'record' 7,811 new Covid-19 cases, 35 deaths | Chandigarh News - Times of India
description: Haryana on Tuesday recorded its highest single-day coronavirus cases at 7,811, taking the state's tally to 3,71,624.

title: Coronavirus | Lockdown won’t imposed in Haryana: CM
description: Arrangements made to ensure no labourer faces any problem, says Manohar Lal

title: He can come to Haryana for better treatment: Anil Vij takes veiled dig at Covid-19-positive Rahul Gandhi
description: The Haryana Health Minister took a veiled dig at Gandhi, saying if the Congress MP finds it difficult to find space in Delhi, he can come to Haryana for better treatment.

title: COVID-19: Haryana trying to ramp up testing by 70,000/day, currently doing 40,000
description: Chandigarh, Apr 20 (ANI): Chief Minister of Haryana, Manohar Lal Khattar on April 20 informed that the state has made preparation to test 40,000 people in single day, and the state government is also trying to increase the testing from 40,000 to 70,000 per day.

title: Haryana to test pilgrims from Haridwar Kumbh, protesting farmers for COVID-19
description: Vij reiterated that the state is not imposing any lockdown and asked migrant workers not to pay heed to 'any propaganda' and said they should continue to work.

title: Haryana govt. has failed to handle COVID crisis: Selja
description: She terms reports of collapse of health services shocking

title: Ex-Haryana CM Bhupinder Singh Hooda, wife test COVID-19 positive
description: The 73-year-old Congress leader and his wife are in Delhi and they will get themselves admitted to a hospital in Gurgaon as a precautionary measure, party MLA B B Batra told PTI.

title: 7,177 Covid-19 cases recorded in Haryana, highest in Gurugram
description: Among the districts that reported a big spike in cases were Gurgaon (2,401), Faridabad (998), Sonipat (573), Hisar (521) and Karnal (501).

title: Covid-19: Haryana restricts physical attendance to 50% in govt offices
description: There are as many as 33,817 active cases in Haryana so far, said the Union Health Ministry today.

title: Delhi, Punjab & Haryana HC Chief Justices Test Positive For Covid-19
description: Both the judges are under home isolation
